snippet: The automotive business generated more than half of Johnson Controls’ revenue for the 2014 fiscal year, but showed signs of slowing growth.
abstract: Industrial parts firm Johnson Controls is mulling over spinning off or selling its auto parts business to focus on other units.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED and ANDREW ROSS SORKIN

lead_paragraph: The automotive business generated more than half of Johnson Controls’ revenue for the 2014 fiscal year, but showed signs of slowing growth.

headline.main: Johnson Controls Considers Spinning Off Car Parts Unit
headline.print_headline: Manufacturer Considers Spinning Off Car Parts Unit
